thread.title: Fashion Calendar, Sept. 10-16
thread.title_full: Fashion Calendar, Sept. 10-16 - The Denver Post

author: The Denver Post
title: Fashion Calendar, Sept. 10-16
text:
EVENTS
Neiman Marcus Denver
Sept. 9: Konstantino Trunk Show. Designer Jewelry, Level One. 10 a.m. - 5 p.m. Sept. 9: Fur Restyle Event with Stephen Stewart from the Whittier California studio. Fur Salon, Level Two. 12 p.m. - 8 p.m. Sept. 10: Fur Restyle Event with Stephen Stewart from the Whittier California studio. Fur Salon, Level Two. 10 a.m. - 3:30 p.m Sept. 11-12: Stephanie Kantis Trunk Show. Designer Jewelry, Level One. 10 a.m. - 5 p.m. Sept. 12: Project Beauty Presentation of Fall 2015 Cosmetics. The presentation will feature the latest in beauty and apparel with commentary by an expert panel and a light brunch. Reserve your seat by calling 720-941-4527. Center Aisle, Level Two. 11 a.m. 3030 E. First Ave.; 303-329-2600; neimanmarcus.com
Denver Modernism Show
Sept. 11-13: The 10th anniversary celebration will feature vintage fashion, home decor and art at the National Western Complex. The "Class of '77 Fashion Show" is at 3 p.m. Saturday, Sept. 12. 4655 Humboldt St., Denver; denvermodernism.com
Dan Sharp Luxury Outerwear
Sept. 14-16: Lafayette Trunk Show featuring the entire Fall Collection. 218 Steele St., Denver; 303-333-6666; dansharpluxuryouterwear.com
BENEFITS & DONATIONS
Outlets at Castle Rock
